title: Best Song Oscar winners 1970-2007
description:
Here are the Academy Award for Best Song winners from 1970-2007:

OSCAR1970 - For All We Know - Lovers and Other Strangers - Carpenters                                                                                 
OSCAR1971 - Shaft - Shaft - Issac Hayes                                                                                                               
OSCAR1972 - The Morning After - The Poseidon Adventure - Maureen McGovern                                                                             
OSCAR1973 - The Way We Were - The Way We Were - Barbra Streisand                                                                                      
OSCAR1974 - We May Never Love Like This Again - The Towering Inferno - Maureen McGovern                                                               
OSCAR1975 - I\&#039;m Easy - Nashville - Keith Carradine                                                                                                    
OSCAR1976 - Evergreen - A Star Is Born - Barbra Streisand                                                                                             
OSCAR1977 - You Light Up My Life - You Light Up My Life - Debbie Boone                                                                                
OSCAR1978 - Last Dance - Thank God It\&#039;s Friday - Donna Summer                                                                                         
OSCAR1979 -  It Goes Like It Goes - Norma Rae - Michael Crawford                                                                                      
OSCAR1980 - I\&#039;m Going To Live Forever - Fame - Irene Cara                                                                                             
OSCAR1981 - Arthur\&#039;s Theme - Arthur - Christopher Cross                                                                                               
OSCAR1982 - Up Where We Belong - An Officer and A Gentleman - Joe Cocker & Jennifer Warnes                                                            
OSCAR1983 - What a Feeling - Flashdance - Irene Cara                                                                                                  
OSCAR1984 - I Just Called To Say I Love You - The Woman In Red - Stevie Wonder                                                                        
OSCAR1985 - Say You, Say Me - White Nights - Lionel Ritchie                                                                                           
OSCAR1986 - Take My Breath Away - Top Gun - Roxette                                                                                                   
OSCAR1987 - I\&#039;ve Had The Time Of My Life - Dirty Dancing - Bill Medley & Jennifer Warnes                                                              
OSCAR1988 - Let the River Run - Working Girl - Carly Simon                                                                                            
OSCAR1989 - Under the Sea - Little Mermaid - Starlights                                                                                               
OSCAR1990 - Sooner Or Later - Dick Tracy - Madonna                                                                                                    
OSCAR1991 - Beauty and the Beast - Beauty and the Beast - Luther Vandross & Celion Dion                                                               
OSCAR1992 - A Whole New World - Aladdin - Peabo Bryson & Regina Belle                                                                                 
OSCAR1993 - Streets of Philadelphia - Philadelphia -  Bruce Springsteen                                                                               
OSCAR1994 - Can You Feel the Love Tonight - The Lion King - Elton John                                                                                
OSCAR1995 -  Colors of the Wind - Pocahontas - Vanessa Williams                                                                                       
OSCAR1996 - You Must Love Me - Evita - Madonna                                                                                                        
OSCAR1997 - My Heart Will Go On - Titanic - Celion Dion                                                                                               
OSCAR1998 - When You Believe - Prince of Egypt - Mariah Carey & Whitney Houston                                                                       
OSCAR1999 - You\&#039;ll Be In My Heart - Tarzan - Phil Collins                                                                                             
OSCAR2000 - Things Have Changed - Wonder Boys - Bob Dylan                                                                                             
OSCAR2001 - If I Didn\&#039;t Have You - Monsters Inc - Randy Newman                                                                                        
OSCAR2002 - Lose Yourself - 8 Mile - Eminem                                                                                                           
OSCAR2003 - Into The West - The Lord of the Rings - Annie Lennox                                                                                      
OSCAR2004 - Al Otro Lado Del Rio - The Motorcycle Diaries - Jorge Drexler                                                                             
OSCAR2005 - It\&#039;s Hard Out Here For A Pimp - Hustle & Flow - Juicy J & DJ Paul                                                                         
OSCAR2006 - I Need To Wake Up - An Inconvenient Truth - Melissa Etheridge                                                                             
OSCAR2007 - Falling Slowly - Once - Glen Hansard & Marketa Irglova
